Top-3 Scripts: ul_243408: sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -s 192.168.0.0/24 -j MASQUERADE

ul_565742: #ENABLE PACKET FORWARD
echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward

#YOU COULD JUST ENABLE FORWARD FOR EVERYTHING WITHOUT LIMITATIONS, USING INTERFACES JUST TO BE MORE SPECIFIC
iptables -A FORWARD -i enp0s3 -o enp0s8 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -i enp0s8 -o enp0s3 -j ACCEPT

#MASQUERADE OUTBOUND CONNECTIONS
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o enp0s8 -j MASQUERADE

au_926116: iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o tun+ -j MASQUERADE

iptables -A FORWARD -i wlan+ -o tun+ -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -o tun+ -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -i tun+ -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED,RELATED   -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -i tun+ -j ACCEPT
